scripts.build: node node_modules/electron/install.js && electron-vite build && bash scripts/play-build-sound.sh
scripts.electron:build: node node_modules/electron/install.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --config electron/electron-builder.json && bash scripts/play-build-sound.sh
scripts.electron:build:mac: node node_modules/electron/install.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --mac --config electron/electron-builder.json && bash scripts/play-build-sound.sh
scripts.electron:build:win: node node_modules/electron/install.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --win --config electron/electron-builder.json && bash scripts/play-build-sound.sh
scripts.electron:build:linux: node node_modules/electron/install.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --linux --config electron/electron-builder.json && bash scripts/play-build-sound.sh
scripts.electron:build:quiet: node node_modules/electron/install.js && electron-vite build && electron-builder --config electron/electron-builder.json
